topic.title: Server Nodes
topic.shortdesc: The Server Nodes section shows statistics across the server nodes in the cluster.

body.p: In addition to monitoring all buckets in the cluster nodes, Couchbase Server includes support for monitoring the statistics for each individual node.
Click on Server Nodes server link to se the analytics view.
body.note: The information for each item is available when you click on the blue triangle on the right side of the stats window.
